chromecast.description: The Cast functionality allows your videos to be cast from the Kaltura player, via the Chromecast plugin, directly to a Kaltura Player receiver application on a Chromecast-connected TV.

parent.doc: Parent container for component. Components include default placement, leave as null if unsure.

applicationID.label: Application ID
applicationID.doc: The Chromecast Application ID. Leave empty if default Kaltura receiver is used
